name: 10 Large Vintage Watch Gears
description:
These parts are great for jewelry, scrapbooking, cardmaking, altered art, steam punk, ACEOs, assemblage projects, collages and more.

	The photo reflects a sampling of what you will receive. All of the gears are very clean. All have 5 spokes and little teeth on the outside. The sizes range from as small as 3/8” through 5/8”. You will receive a variety.

	We have selected a variety of the best 10 from a large lot. The photo is only a sampling and may or may not include the same designs of the wheels in the photo, although all are 5 spoked with teeth around the edge and within the range of 3/8” – 5/8”. They are way too tedious to take photos of each lot.

name: 20 Tiny Watch Gears
description:
Great for jewelry, scrapbooking, cardmaking, altered art, steam punk, ACEOs, assemblage projects, collages and more.

	The photo reflects a sampling of what you will receive. All of the gears are very clean. All have 5 spokes and little teeth on the outside. The sizes range from as small as 1/8” through 1/4” in diameter. You will receive a variety of this size range.

	We have selected a variety of the best 20 from a large lot. The photo is only a sampling and may or may not include the same gears/wheels in the photo, although all are 5 spoked with teeth around the edge and within the range of 1/8” – 1/4” in diameter.

name: Set of 3 Soft Copper Bookplates
Handcrocheted Washcloth - Linen Marble cotton yarn
description: Handcrocheted Washcloth in a Linen Marble Cotton yarn. Approximate dimensions are 6” X 6” Single crocheted in a single strand of cotton yarn. The cotton yarn allows for gentle exfoliation. Rinses clean and drips dry easily. Wrapped neatly and tied with a lovely olive color ribbon. Packaged in a beautiful gift bag ready for gift giving or treat yourself to a special gift. I also hand knit and crochet these in many different patterns and colors. All of my washcloths are hand crocheted or hand knitted from a cotton yarn.

name: 100 Watch Stems - Variety of Sizes
description:
100 Watch Stems – Variety of Sizes – includes plastic storage jar – great for jewelry, altered art, assemblage, steam punk, collages, scrapbooking and more!

	Packaged in a plastic container with snap on lid for easy storage.
